---
title: "Groundnut Stew"
author: "Rukmini Iyer"
categories: [vegan]
---

- 1kg sweet potatoes 1cm slices
- 1 onion
- 2 cloves garlic
- 2cm ginger
- 1 chilli
- 50g peanut butter
- time profile
- 1 tin of tomatoes
- 400ml veg stock
- coriander
- salted peanuts

1. Preheat oven 180 fan
1. Mix sweet potatoes, onion, garlic chill in roasting tin with oil and sea salt. Roast for 45 min
1. Add chopped toms, peanut butter and stock back into oven for 15 min
1. Serve with rice, coriander and peanuts
